itunes:title: Women & Men in The Word: New Testament Week 6 with Jefferson Bethke
title: Women & Men in The Word: New Testament Week 6 with Jefferson Bethke
description:
For the final week of our Women & Men in the Word: New Testament series, Raechel and Amanda sit down with author, speaker, YouTuber, and cheerleader of families, Jefferson Bethke. Together they discuss the stories of Cornelius, James, Priscilla & Aquila, Timothy, and Philemon & Onesimus. Their lively conversation covers covenants and power couples, faith and doubt, dinnertime antics, and the beautiful complexity of the body of Christ. Through Jesus, all are welcome to feast at God’s family table. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 6 of the She Reads Truth Women & Men in the Word: New Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Women & Men in the Word: New Testament collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 20% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code SUB20. July’s box will include our upcoming Ephesians Study Book.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/wmitwnt-week-6-with-jefferson-bethke/
